website_summaries.verdict: Many athletes recognized the Ride 8 because of its moderate weight, great heel cushioning, and overall durability. It’s a neutral running footwear that anyone can pick up and enjoy. It may just be the perfect shoe for runners who are looking for a dependable daily trainer.
pros: Most runners were impressed with the shoe’s FlexFilm upper which gives an adequate fit without sacrificing weight
A few users noticed that the Ride 8 has a more appealing design than its predecessors
Many reviewers took note of the shoe's flexibility
The mid-sole unit is essentially a smorgasbord of great technologies that would help the runner move forward in a much more efficient way
The durability of this 8th version of the series is also lauded
The outsole has components that improve traction and protection against abrasion
cons: The Sauncony Ride 8 his slightly expensive
There were testers who thought that the forefoot area also deserved more cushioning because the systems were mostly found in the heel and mid-foot sections
Some runners noted that the Open Mesh upper isn’t as breathable as intended, making their feet warmer inside

customer_reviews.title: Another good pair of Saucony
customer_reviews.text: I'm nearing the end of life for these shoes. They will get 400+ miles without any issues. For me, that's the sign of a good product. I'm a fan of Saucony in general and was able to get this pair at a pretty good price. They are pretty supportive (which I need with my weight and weekly mileage). I have low arches and all the issues associated with them, but find Saucony are about the best shoes for my feet. I mostly run on hard surfaces but have done some trails with these shoes also. They breathe well and are fairly light considering the amount of cushion (well engineered).
customer_reviews.author: Ramsay

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these shoes for my son who is a runner on his high school team. They were very comfortable and gave good support. However, after having them just a week and worn only for a couple of 5-mile runs the green rubber pieces glued on the bottom of the sole started falling off. I checked and found others not so well glued beginning to let go. The failure of the pair I got was obviously caused by a manufacturers defect. Given the high ratings these shoes received in reviews I assume my case was isolated. I am really bothered that the manufacturer would let such a serious defect come through their quality control though.
customer_reviews.author: Philtechy

customer_reviews.title: Buyer be aware. Usually an awesome shoe, but may come defective.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of this model. Pairs 1 & 2 are still wearable, after 2-3 years and 300-400 miles of moderate/heavy running each. This pair however has fallen apart under less than 25 miles of light walking. I am very disappointed with by this. My full review is that I love this model; hence the reason I went back for a third pair. The shoes are extremely comfortable right out of the box and stay breathable and comfortable even 10 after 10 miles of straight running. I am also disappointed with Saucony because they will only return or exchange unworn brand new shoes. I suppose they don’t care much for customer loyalty.
customer_reviews.author: M. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Good running show
customer_reviews.text: This was my third pair of this Saucony model....pair number two is on the way out and I wanted to make sure I had a good back up. The shoes fit well though the size is a half size larger than other brands I wear. They are used almost every day to run 2-3 miles distance or intervals. Used only for running and workouts each pair has lasted more than a year which seems pretty reasonable give the price. I retired the first pair when the heel pads began to split and the mesh along the toes starting breaking through. Surprisingly, the cushioning of sole/insole held up really well after hundreds of miles so no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kay's Husband

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker!
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd pair of Saucony sneakers that I have bought, out of the Ride 6 and the Guide 8. The Ride 6 being my favorite so far. The 8 is a great sneaker I just feel that the 6 had a bit more arch support; that’s not to say that Ride 8 doesn’t. The material is thin but not cheap and overall this sneaker is very light. It’s actually very similar to the Guide 8. In terms of competitor comparison, I think it’s on par with the Nike Vapormax Flynit 3. (Just at half the price) It’s very good for long jogs. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Trent

customer_reviews.title: Search is OVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these Saucony Ride 8 last week. I’ve tried at lest 4 different types of Saucony running shoes in last months. I was looking for same fit and performance as Saucony Triumph ISO, but couldn’t find them in my size. So finally search is OVER. Just ran this morning 4.23.20 5k at 6:54 avg pace. They feel GREAT. Good shock absorption at the heel. 8mm off set from heel to toe. As saying goes : “ you get what you pay for” These are $120 , it’s not cheap, but if you care about your legs and performance during races it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushioned, true to size
customer_reviews.text: I haven't run in Saucony for several years, but was getting frustrated with the last few shoes I'd bought online lately. Nothing seemed to fit to size anymore. I decided on the Saucony Ride 8s because of the many positive reviews I read, and I was not disappointed with the outcome. These shoes fit true to size, have a nice amount of cushioning, and pretty nicely. I've only put about 15 - 20 miles on them so far, but I've been pleased with the fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Garp10

customer_reviews.title: As a runner, I'd highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These were absolutely excellent shoes. Fit perfectly, and are incredibly comfortable. As a runner, I just got this new pair as I'm training for a marathon. The colors are great (honestly look so much nicer in person than in the photos) and overall are excellent for running. For this price, I'd recommend these in a heartbeat! Nothing beats a good pair of Saucony running shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am not an experienced runner by any stretch, but since I got these I have been running 3x per week in the morning about 2 miles. They are comfortable and I have not had any issues with my feet. It's been about 3 months. I would recommend them. Plus they didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: DJP, PELS

customer_reviews.title: I am the destroyer of shoes....and these don't last.
customer_reviews.text: I love the comfort of these shoes, which is why I continue to buy them. BUT, I have to knock a star because EVERY pair of Saucony I have bought falls apart a few months in. ALL of the soles on every pair I have owned fails and falls off. My last pair, bought in June, which I used for a mile walk each day, coaching 3 hours a day in June, and then casual wear, just had the sole fall off the other day. Good thing I have these all set to go. I do think this might have to be my last pair if these fail.....but I love their comfort....so torn.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pregs

customer_reviews.title: but I've always had issues with heel pressure from high arches and poor cushioned shoes
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a shoe that fits well for high arches. These work !!!. I'm not the marathon runner, but I've always had issues with heel pressure from high arches and poor cushioned shoes. These shoes are well cushioned and distribute the load over my entire foot area. I really like these shoes. Toe area was not too tight, unlike the mizuno's I had prior to these.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Young

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for someone on their feet all day on a hard concrete floor. MY VA foot doctor recommended running shoes for my job at The Home Depot. I walk an average of 5 miles a shift on the hard concrete floor. These shoes look and feel great. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Vetter

customer_reviews.title: Heel not as durable as previous Rides
customer_reviews.text: Have run in Saucony Ride shoes for years. The 8 still fits well & is comfortable right out of the box, but the heel material has not held up as well as previous Ride shoes have. Not sure if they changed the material or the heel height. My Ride 7's have less heel ware & I have them much longer. I usually keep 3 pairs of shoes & rotate them.
customer_reviews.author: J Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Great athletic shoe
customer_reviews.text: My wife has the ladies version of this shoe and she just loves them. In fact she ordered another pair. I have started to work out with her and found out I needed better support in my shoes. So, she got me a pair. I was amazed with the support and lightness of the shoe. I know now why she went on about them. Great shoe for running and walking. No pain or blisters from wearing them right out of the box. Will probably order me another pair for spare!
customer_reviews.author: Shoequeen

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, watch out for wearing holes in the toes, though
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, but I have one small complaint. The older versions of this shoe had a leather cover directly on top of the toe box, whereas this version has only cloth there. For this reason, I've had multiple pairs of these wear a hole where my big toe hits the top of the shoe. The older version were reinforced by the leather and did not have this problem. Same is true of the Triumph ISOs, frankly.
customer_reviews.author: JoseMonkey

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable wide shoes. As good as any $120 asics I've bought. I work on a concrete floor in a factory all day and these shoes really help my back. I can normally get about 6 months out of them or longer before the soles lose their spring. I'm not just talking these shoes but Saucony's in gereral. I did buy these shoes for good but they will rotate to my work shoes. Saucony running shoes are the best "bang for the buck" period. I also like the fact these shoes have a modern look as well
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Sneaker may not fit as desired even if the correct size is choosen.
customer_reviews.text: These are the fourth pair of the same exact model and size sneaker. Although these are the same size as my old, 10.5, they are visible larger them my old sneakers. I verified on my old sneakers on the inside tag they they are 10.5 the same as the ones I bought, but again the new ones are waaaay too big. I threw away the box that the new sneakers came in as I didn't think to check to see if they fit based on my previous three experiences. I hope that the box is not needed when sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Mike ransom

customer_reviews.title: Tread peeling off, seller won't exchange
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, very comfortable, had current pair for less than 2 months. But I've only used this pair a few times and the tread started to separate, not worn out but peeling off. I asked for an exchange and was told I was over the 45 days. I struggle with buying another pair from Amazon or at least this vendor since they are clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: K in MI

customer_reviews.title: but I was not happy with this recent pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I have purchased these shoes. In the past they have done well for me, but I was not happy with this recent pair. After only a few days the tread at the bottom of the shoes started coming off. I should have returned them right away, but did not because it was only a small piece that came off. Now I can hardly wear them since the tread is completely coming off.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Souls come unglued on these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Have owned many pairs of sauconys in the past and have never had a single issue and why i continue to purchase from them. But the ride 8 have been far from what i have come to expect from the maker. First pair the souls started coming unglued after just 3 times used whuch i returned for a identical pair thinking it was a fluke only to have the replacement pair do the same exact thing after just 5 times used and why im returning for the second time and trying a different style.
customer_reviews.author: erik heath

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT shoe for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Other than wishing size 12 was available, but 11.5 isn't bad, it's a great shoe! Very comfortable and well cushioned. And i was very shocked at the price. Is as good as a shoe worth $50 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bottom peels off after lite use
customer_reviews.text: No problems with these shoes except that the bottom rubber started peeling off after only lite use. I had to fix with super glue. Not something you would expect from such an expensive shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: shoe falls apart
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is just awful. Fits well, runs well, but...the TREAD falls off after 1 or 2 runs. I've bought this particular Saucony shoe twice and they've both fallen apart on the bottom. I haven't had this problem with other Saucony products; just having a problem with this one. An absolute waste of money! I will never buy this particular shoe again! BTW, I would like my money back as this is a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: andre benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Been using this shoe for a long time. Oredered the 8.5 2e 5 years ago and feel very short for my feet. Then order the 9 regular but its tight on my feet. Hope they have a 9 2e. But this shoe is very durable and light. Its really great for running. Would order it again in 2 years
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Shoe very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of Saucony men’s shoes. They are comfortable and fit my feet very well. I have no arch hardly so they do support my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda J Posing

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these last year and turned out to be the best running shoe I have ever had. Since I know my size it was easy to order the same model on line. I just wish the soles of any running shoe would last me longer as I wear them out in a few months but they otherwise look like new.
customer_reviews.author: Sparky

customer_reviews.title: This is a great shoe! When I started running half marathons four ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe! When I started running half marathons four years ago this was the shoe suggested at the running store, and have stuck with it because of the price. Not quite able to drop 120.00 or so dollars every time I need new running shoes, so I purchase what I know does a great job at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: PHILLYCD05

customer_reviews.title: The right fit
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are are just right. Tried a different brand after wearing these for the last 5 years and it just didn't work. They are comfortable and supportive. I wear mine day-in day-out, for running and everyday running around. They are the best shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: David Mooneyhan

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality running shoes
customer_reviews.text: the quality and design of the shoes ,I have been using saucony for the last 10 years and the branding is outstanding ,fits very well for protecting your feet while running or fast walking. the design and color look impressive.
customer_reviews.author: vicente nazario

customer_reviews.title: Sunday Shoe Delivery!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took them out, put them on and just had to go run . . . great feel and form right out of the box. No strain points or sore joints . . . even on my 60 year old joints!!! Still running strong on Saucony's great stature-correction support construction. Back and legs feel good too . . . Even put another pair on my X-mas wish list.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in these shoes. I've had them 2 months and only worn them a handful of times with light use (No running, trails, or anything along those lines) and parts of the sole are detaching from each other. I've owned many pairs of Saucony and never had this problem in the past, but I recommend steering clear of these.
customer_reviews.author: Chimestreet

customer_reviews.title: Not holding up!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ran in these shoes for around 10 miles and wear them to work on casual dress days. The sole on the ball of your foot is beginning to peel back. This occurred in a month and a half. The shoe is very comfortable, but should never fall apart this fast.
customer_reviews.author: DMG

customer_reviews.title: Saucony did it again!
customer_reviews.text: Fit well with no break in time and extremely comfortable!! Very good looking shoe and the price was amazing. I'm going to order another pair and set them back for when I wear these out. A lot of people comment on the appearance. Keep it up Saucony!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will love you
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Sauconys. I am still blown away by the fit and comfort. I have to run in wides and these are very comfortable on my feet. The colors are unique and the fabric is very durable. I will continue to order these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Richardson

customer_reviews.title: The fit and comfort with these shoes are great. The problem with them is the durability
customer_reviews.text: The fit and comfort with these shoes are great. The problem with them is the durability. I've worn these minimally on light runs and the bottom of the sneakers are falling apart. I keep finding new spots I have to super glue to keep them together. I do not recommend these because of the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Saucony shoes. I didn't plan brand loyalty, but I am thrilled at the quality and performance of these shoes. They have improved my pace right off the bat and it is still improving. I'd recommend these to anyone without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Chem Freak

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoe I've owned.
customer_reviews.text: I've run in everything over the years - most comfortable running shoe I've owned. I was thrilled to find these on Amazon for half the price and re-ordered my 2nd pair as these fit WAY better than the newer model Ride's - seriously, I tried out the new Ride for $120ish and returned and bought the Ride 8 again......love this shoes. It is more cushy and not as aggressive feeling as some shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these a few months ago, they have less than 20 miles of walking on them and the soles are coming apart on both shoes. Have been buying Saucony for years, very disappointed in the quality of these.
customer_reviews.author: R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good fitting and comfortable running sneaker
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my 3rd pair of the Ride 8's. I keep buying them because they fit my foot really well and they are super comfortable. I did not buy the newer Ride sneakers as some of the reviewers here on Amazon said the newer versions (Ride 9,10) did not fit as well as the Ride 8's. I typically wear a size 9 1/12 shoe or sneaker. With these sneakers the 10 fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always have problems with shoes. These do the best job of any I have tried in handling my foot challenges.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Should have bought these years ago, would have saved money buying others.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how they did it, these shoes make you run faster. I used them for some longer tempo runs, they push you a little faster than you might want. That is good, Ran with these in a 5K and won! Great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes. This was my first time buying Saucony and i have been pleasantly surprised. The shoes are extremely comfortable compared to the Nike Frees that i am used to wearing. Much more support and cushion. I didn't want to spend $120 for comparable running shoes so i started researching the Sauconys. I was fortunate enough to purchase them on a day when the price had been lowered. So i was definitely impressed with the product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian E Waller

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair!
customer_reviews.text: My second pair. My last pair lasted 250 miles but I run a lot of trails vs. street. I live in SoCal. Was happy that I didn't have to visit RoadRunner Sport!
customer_reviews.author: James Olmos

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of this model my husband has had. Great shoe. Great price. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: One of the best running shoes I've owned
customer_reviews.text: One of the best running shoes I've owned! Not particularly different from the previous generation which I also liked. It has just the right amount of cushion for my runs. I also love that it has a wide option which is a must for me. I haven't had any pain since I started using these.
customer_reviews.author: Javi

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair of the Ride 8s. I primarily use these for road running and have been able to get 300-350 miles out of them before my feet start hurting. Would definitely recommend these shoes. I will most likely try out the Ride 9s after I wear these out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I liked the style, but this shoe seems to fit a little bit snugger than my other Saucony's.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Cook

customer_reviews.title: These shoes have tread that falls apart
customer_reviews.text: I have had more than a dozen saucony men’s running shoes over the years ... two pairs in a row Ride 8 and Ride 9 have treads that peeled off in only a few uses I will not by Saucony nor recommend them again Great shoes when they do not fall apart ... but they do
customer_reviews.author: Paul D Mann

customer_reviews.title: Very nice running shoe
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 9. But since these are replacing my Ride 7's I knew to order a half size bigger. These feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline David

customer_reviews.title: Great for running.
customer_reviews.text: These fit my son perfectly. Third pair he has owned of this exact model. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Worn out very quickly
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light but they worn out very bad very quickly. The laces’ material felt like nylon, very slippery.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marzan

customer_reviews.title: Sole Started to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: After 70 miles of a mix of treadmill and road the sole patches started to fall apart like other people have suggested. I got more than 250 miles from my other saucony ride 6. Dissatisfied with the quality and decided to try Hoka one one as my next race running shoe
customer_reviews.author: Richard J.

customer_reviews.title: I have had multiple surgeries on my ankle, and ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had multiple surgeries on my ankle, and these are the only shoes I've found that I could run 15 miles in without any pain. This purchase was my third pair. Don't you go changing anything, Saucony.
customer_reviews.author: NJS

customer_reviews.title: This shoe is peeling on the sole.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe started to peel on the sole after 2 weeks. The refund period has passed and I would like a replacement pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great long mileage trainer.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the Ride 8. Great shoe, long lasting long mileage training shoe. I have gotten 500+ miles from my last two pairs and recently picked up 2 more pairs before they are completely phased out.
customer_reviews.author: faust

customer_reviews.title: Much smaller than previous pairs. Had to send them ...
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than previous pairs. Had to send them back. My daughter has had same problem with her Saucony shoes too. It seems they are now all running smaller --- oops... talking widths.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: A great running shoe.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of Saucony's running shoes. Earlier this year I switched from the Guide series (a stability shoe) to the Ride series (a neutral shoe). The shoe is light weight and provides just the right amount of cushioning for long runs.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes. Comfortable to run
customer_reviews.text: (Slight supination). Good shoes. Comfortable to run. Seem to be lasting well.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent User

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Shoe! Corny Look!
customer_reviews.text: Great support for mid foot\ heel strikers. The look is kinda corny though. The lace also stops right on the arch of my foot and it hurts, I feel like there's a lacing technique i should be doing but I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: Carlo

customer_reviews.title: Great for running
customer_reviews.text: Great for running. I have these and the guide 8. Both have great cushion. I usually run between 3-5 miles and these get the job done. Saucony is the only brand I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Live fast, die young.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is comfortable, light and fast; however I have had trouble with the tread from the start. Whatever glue they are using to hold on the tread does not last very long. It is a continuous battle of adding glue to a new section of thread that is loose.
customer_reviews.author: Jefffy

customer_reviews.title: Can keep pace with no breaks.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes, I've got about 300 miles on them now and feel like they've got a bit more (6'2" 215 Marine running in them). Solid shoe that can handle trail running and road/track running as well
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: and I love it. They progressed nicely
customer_reviews.text: Another quality shoe for running by Saucony. I have had Ride 3/4/5/6 (multiple pair of 6) and now the 8, and I love it. They progressed nicely. Probably will get another couple pair of these especially if I ramp up my running again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Returned them because they were a bit small and I didn't like the uneven tread feel under the ball of my foot and big toe. I suspect they are designed this way because both shoes felt the same.
customer_reviews.author: smileyburg

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them
customer_reviews.text: As always Saucony always comes through. I use them for running and power walking and so comfortable, besides the construction and color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customersandra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite Saucony pair but I like them. They fit a smidge smaller than usual but comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: W. Winkley

customer_reviews.title: Saucony is my favorite brand of shoes for running
customer_reviews.text: Saucony is my favorite brand of shoes for running. Unfortunately, more people are thinking the same thing and the price on these shoes keeps going up every year when I need a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: A Brown

customer_reviews.title: The fit is comfortable, but the sole is ordinary and does not ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these shoes at the gym: running on treadmill gets the most wear. The fit is comfortable, but the sole is ordinary and does not offer much shock absorbancy. It is an inexpensive shoe and is OK for my purposes.
customer_reviews.author: zyyoll

customer_reviews.title: Should be Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I purchased was replaced for sole separation within two weeks. My replacement pair is now doing the exact same thing 30 days post purchase. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Deutsch

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased. Hard to buy footware online
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Hard to buy footware online, but these were great for me- very cushioned and wide enough in the toebox for my feet.
customer_reviews.author: RTsays

customer_reviews.title: ... different but Ride 8 & 9 have been the best running shoes I've owned in my 36 years on ...
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's foot is different but Ride 8 & 9 have been the best running shoes I've owned in my 36 years on this planet. Like Asics Nimbus without the big price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Giant Yoda

customer_reviews.title: Heel Cushion Erodes
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Saucony Ride's for a couple of years and this was the first defect I had with the shoe. My left heel cushion completely wore down and all the cushion in that spot was eroded away after less than 100 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: These seem a bit tighter than my previous pair but ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem a bit tighter than my previous pair but I don't know if the were the Ride 8 or not. They seem to be loosening up as I wear them more
customer_reviews.author: Jonj

customer_reviews.title: Great distance running sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have had this model of Saucony's before and run one full marathon in them. They worked great through training and for the full 26.2 miles.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Part of the sole of these shoes came off after ...
customer_reviews.text: Part of the sole of these shoes came off after 15 miles..... this is the third pair that has done this. The other two pairs lasted longer than this pair, but they did not last as long as expected. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Saucony makes a great running shoe. These are no exception. Cushioning is good enough for this clydesdale runner.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Feel great! Look good
customer_reviews.text: Saucony - Ride 8 / sz 12 / one month into them - wear just about every day! Feel great! Look good! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Whitcomb

customer_reviews.title: Really good fit for 2Ewide
customer_reviews.text: No surprises here - plenty of room in the toe box and the forefoot. Shoe lightweight even with the sports orthotics that i wear. Balanced when running. Too soon to determine wear life.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes. had to replace my old ones after 1,000 miles of running. I was way past due and the price wasn't bad!
customer_reviews.author: Rob J

customer_reviews.title: 😁 Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his shoe. Could only find it here. Great for running or if your on your feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Strauss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great for me as a walker because of the 8mm drop, heel to toe.
customer_reviews.author: Barney R. Weaver

customer_reviews.title: falling apart already
customer_reviews.text: had for 2 weeks and only ran in them once. bottom tread already coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Th Saucony shoes are very good and I'm very pleased with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wear orthotic arch supports so I never need the arch support provided by any shoes I buy. Th Saucony shoes are very good and I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Caperton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third pair of these shoes -- not too cushioned, not to stiff. Perfect fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Cullen

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice fit and excellent service delivery wise. I have put about six miles on them. They feel good and comfortable. I really recommend Saucony shoes, these are about the 6th pair in a row purchased. All good!
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy

customer_reviews.title: Used for distance running
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses these for running. He used to use the Ride 7. But recently upgraded to these. He runs 6+ miles a almost every day. He will buy another pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: so wearing a men's walking shoe is perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: The neutral shoe fits me perfectly. i have a wider foot, so wearing a men's walking shoe is perfect for me. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Alana Steffensen

customer_reviews.title: Little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: My husband always uses this brand of tennis shoes and he is a runner. In this case I had to return them because they were small. But this running shoe itself looked very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Marta Quinn

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for bigger runners
customer_reviews.text: Great, light running shoe. Breathes very well and keeps feet cool. Great cushioning and support for bigger people!
customer_reviews.author: Nick the Fireman

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed. Item purchased dozens of soucony running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Item purchased dozens of soucony running shoes, the only shoe that I will purchase. But I've never purchased one with an insole as uncomfortable as this one. Bottom of the soul hard as a rock.shoe fits good but it's not very comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: mark H

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the upgrades in the sole
customer_reviews.text: I got these after finally wearing out my Ride 5's. I LOVE the upgrades in the sole. The toe box is still the same feel, which is exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan S.

customer_reviews.title: I don't like them nearly as much as the Ride 6
customer_reviews.text: I don't like them nearly as much as the Ride 6. Very disappointed that Saucony changed this model. Newer is NOT better!
customer_reviews.author: Mistervh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have the exact same shoe (different color) and wanted find the same. These fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Ed L.

customer_reviews.title: 5 is a perfect fit. Two pairs of different model saucony 10
customer_reviews.text: 10.5 doesn't fit. I have only worn saucony trail shoes and 10.5 is a perfect fit. Two pairs of different model saucony 10.5 are too small. I gave up on Saucony running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: TravisInternational

customer_reviews.title: Great  shoe, value.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe works for me, so if I can buy a pair for $70, I just add it to my collection,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: loved  the  colour
customer_reviews.text: sent back as i need the wide . but i loved the colour of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: David Pistey

customer_reviews.title: I like the color of the shoe
customer_reviews.text: I like the color of the shoe, and it is very comfortable! So far I just went on a 3 mile walk with them on to break them in!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Zanoni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes and I will continue to buy them
customer_reviews.author: Tyler E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit and the support. I plan to get many miles out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: An excellent shoe for all types of running. Cushioned, yet still light weight. I've been running in the Saucony Ride for 4 years and have no plans to change.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Neuman

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Ride 8 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: The saucony ride 8 is providing enhanced fit without adding weight due to the flexfilm upper. Powerfoam material is integrated with grid technology to create a system that effectively centres the foot, absorbs impact and distributes pressure. Collar lining material combines superior moisture wicking properties with a plush feel.
feature_bullets: ** NEW ** Rundry - An interior lining that wicks away moisture.
** NEW ** Increased Forefoot Flare - Creates a propulsion platform with a support during toe-off.
** UPDATED ** Reconfigured Bevelled Heel and Landing Zone - Adapts to a wider variety of footstrikes.
** UPDATED ** Revised Forefoot Configuration and Vertical Flex Grooves - Deliver a greater amount of support and flexibility.
** UPDATED ** Redesigned Upper - Fewer overlays and more seamless welds improve the overall fit. The mesh is now lighter and more breathable, keeping your feet cool and comfortable.
